# coreweave_observability_telemetry_relay_endpoint_s3 (Resource)

CoreWeave Telemetry Relay S3 forwarding endpoint. Forwards telemetry data to an S3-compatible bucket.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# S3 endpoint with AWS credentials
resource "coreweave_observability_telemetry_relay_endpoint_s3" "example" {
  slug         = "my-s3-endpoint"
  display_name = "My S3 Endpoint"
  bucket       = "s3://my-telemetry-bucket"
  region       = "us-east-1"

  credentials = {
    access_key_id     = "AKIAIOSFODNN7EXAMPLE"
    secret_access_key = "wJalrXUtnFEMI/K7MDENG/bPxRfiCYEXAMPLEKEY"
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `bucket` (String) The S3 bucket URI (e.g., s3://bucket-name).
- `display_name` (String) The display name of the forwarding endpoint.
- `region` (String) The AWS region for the S3 bucket.
- `slug` (String) The slug of the forwarding endpoint. Used as a unique identifier.

### Optional

- `credentials` (Attributes) AWS credentials for S3 bucket access. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--credentials))

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) The creation time of the forwarding endpoint.
- `state` (String) The state of the forwarding endpoint.
- `state_code` (Number) The state code of the forwarding endpoint.
- `state_message` (String) The state message of the forwarding endpoint.
- `updated_at` (String) The last update time of the forwarding endpoint.

<a id="nestedatt--credentials"></a>
### Nested Schema for `credentials`

Required:

- `access_key_id` (String, Sensitive) AWS Access Key ID for S3 authentication.
- `secret_access_key` (String, Sensitive) AWS Secret Access Key for S3 authentication.

Optional:

- `session_token` (String, Sensitive) AWS Session Token for temporary S3 credentials (optional).

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
terraform import coreweave_observability_telemetry_relay_endpoint_s3.example my-s3-endpoint
```
